sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import { Page, Text, View, Document, StyleSheet, Image } from '@react-pdf/renderer'; import { PDFViewer } from '@react-pdf/renderer'; import "./AttachmentViewer.css"; import letterheadImage from "../assets/img/referralLetterhead.jpg"; const styles = StyleSheet.create({ page: { flexDirection: 'row', backgroundColor: 'white' }, section: { margin: 10, padding: 10, flexGrow: 1, width: 80, }, text:{ lineHeight: "3rem" } }); let docProps = null; const MyDocument = () => ( This is a test document I could be a prescription, referral or the like. {docProps.pdfData.title} {docProps.pdfData.test} {docProps.pdfData.user && ( Here is some sample data Staff: Name: {docProps.pdfData.user.name} Phone: {docProps.pdfData.user.phone} Town: {docProps.pdfData.user.address.town} )} {docProps.pdfData.patient && ( Here is some sample data Patient Name: {docProps.pdfData.patient.name} Phone: {docProps.pdfData.patient.contact.phone} Town: {docProps.pdfData.patient.address.town} )} {docProps.pdfData.appointment && ( Here is some sample data Appointment Name: {docProps.pdfData.appointment.title} Patient: {docProps.pdfData.appointment.patient.name} Time: {docProps.pdfData.appointment.time} )} ); const PatientReferral = () => ( {docProps.pdfData.title} Dear Dr {docProps.pdfData.patient.referringDoctor.name} Thank you for referring {docProps.pdfData.patient.name} who I saw on {docProps.pdfData.visitDate} My findings are as follows: {docProps.pdfData.findings} For this I recommend the following: {docProps.pdfData.recommendation} Referral: {docProps.pdfData.referral} Visit Diagnosis: title: {docProps.pdfData.visitDiagnosis[0].title} date: {new Date(docProps.pdfData.visitDiagnosis[0].date.substr(0,10)*1000).toISOString().slice(0,10)} type: {docProps.pdfData.visitDiagnosis[0].type} description: {docProps.pdfData.visitDiagnosis[0].description} Visit Treatment: title:{docProps.pdfData.visitTreatment[0].title} type:{docProps.pdfData.visitTreatment[0].type} date: {new Date(docProps.pdfData.visitTreatment[0].date.substr(0,10)*1000).toISOString().slice(0,10)} description:{docProps.pdfData.visitTreatment[0].description} dose:{docProps.pdfData.visitTreatment[0].dose} frequency:{docProps.pdfData.visitTreatment[0].frequency} ); const OperationReminder = () => ( {docProps.pdfData.patient && ( {docProps.pdfData.title} Name: {docProps.pdfData.patient.name} Age: {docProps.pdfData.patient.age} Address: {docProps.pdfData.patient.address.number}, {docProps.pdfData.patient.address.street} {docProps.pdfData.patient.address.town}, {docProps.pdfData.patient.address.parish} Operation Name: {docProps.pdfData.name} Hospital Name: {docProps.pdfData.hospitalName} Address: {docProps.pdfData.hospitalAddress} Date of Operation: {docProps.pdfData.date} Time: {docProps.pdfData.time} You must attend ... {docProps.pdfData.hospitalName} Hospital At... {docProps.pdfData.time} ... on ... {docProps.pdfData.date} You should have NOTHING to Eat or Drink after ... {docProps.pdfData.fastTime} ... on ... {docProps.pdfData.fastDate} Please take night clothes, toilet articles and hospital fee with you! Estimated Cost: {docProps.pdfData.estimateCost} )} ); const MiscNote = () => ( {docProps.pdfData.patient && ( {docProps.pdfData.title} Name: {docProps.pdfData.patient.name} note #1: {docProps.pdfData.note1} note #2: {docProps.pdfData.note2} )} ); const SickNote = () => ( {docProps.pdfData.patient && ( {docProps.pdfData.title} To Whom It May Concern Date: {docProps.pdfData.date} {docProps.pdfData.receiverAddress} Dear Sir/Madam, This is to certify that I have seen and examined Mr. /Mrs. /Miss: {docProps.pdfData.patient.name} and recommended that she /he should refrain from active duty for at least ... {docProps.pdfData.duration} days commencing ... {docProps.pdfData.startDate} Yours Truly )} ); const DiagTest = () => ( {docProps.pdfData.patient && ( {docProps.pdfData.title} Date: {docProps.pdfData.date} To: {docProps.pdfData.receiverAddress} Name: {docProps.pdfData.patient.name} Address: {docProps.pdfData.patient.address.number} {docProps.pdfData.patient.address.street} {docProps.pdfData.patient.address.parish} Test(s) Required: {docProps.pdfData.requiredTests} )} ); const InsuranceNote = () => ( {docProps.pdfData.patient && ( {docProps.pdfData.title} Insurance Patient's Name: {docProps.pdfData.patient.name} Age: {docProps.pdfData.patient.age} Address: {docProps.pdfData.patient.address.number}, {docProps.pdfData.patient.address.street} {docProps.pdfData.patient.address.town}, {docProps.pdfData.patient.address.parish} Subscriber: {docProps.pdfData.patientInsurance[0].company} Policy No: {docProps.pdfData.patientInsurance[0].number} Plan: {docProps.pdfData.patientInsurance[0].description} Employer: {docProps.pdfData.patient.occupation.employer} Proposed Operation: {docProps.pdfData.operation} Date of Operation: {docProps.pdfData.operationDate} Surgeon's Fee: ${docProps.pdfData.surgeonFee} Assistant Surgeon's Fee: ${docProps.pdfData.assistantSurgeonFee} Anesthetist's Fee: ${docProps.pdfData.anesthetistsFee} Please review for approval for Surgery and Insurance payment. Thanks. )} ); const Prescription = () => ( {docProps.pdfData.patient && ( {docProps.pdfData.title} Date: {docProps.pdfData.date} Name: {docProps.pdfData.patient.name} Age: {docProps.pdfData.patient.age} Address: {docProps.pdfData.patient.address.number}, {docProps.pdfData.patient.address.street} {docProps.pdfData.patient.address.town}, {docProps.pdfData.patient.address.parish} Prescription: {docProps.pdfData.prescription} Generic? {docProps.pdfData.generic} Repeat: {docProps.pdfData.repeat} Doctor: {docProps.pdfData.consultantName} Signature: _______ )} ); const ProcedureConsent = () => ( {docProps.pdfData.patient && ( {docProps.pdfData.title} Date: {docProps.pdfData.date} Patient's Name: {docProps.pdfData.patient.name} Patient's Age: {docProps.pdfData.patient.age} I {docProps.pdfData.consentGiver} do hereby give consent to have {docProps.pdfData.procedure} performed upon {docProps.pdfData.consentGiverRelation} The procedure, its risks and possible complications have been fully explained to me. This procedure will be done uder local anesthetic and/or sedation. I understand and am in agreement with proceeding with same. Signed: Name: Signed: Witness: Doctor/Surgeon Signature: Name: )} ); const FitToFly = () => ( {docProps.pdfData.patient && ( {docProps.pdfData.title} Date: {docProps.pdfData.date} Patient's Name: {docProps.pdfData.patient.name} Patient's D.O.B: {docProps.pdfData.patient.dob} Patient's Age: {docProps.pdfData.patient.age} Patient's Sex: {docProps.pdfData.patient.gender} Clinical Features: {docProps.pdfData.clinicalFeatures} Provisional Investigation: {docProps.pdfData.provisionalInvestigation} Conclusion: {docProps.pdfData.conclusion} )} ); const TreatmentInstruction = () => ( {docProps.pdfData.patient && ( {docProps.pdfData.title} Date: {docProps.pdfData.date} Patient Name: {docProps.pdfData.patient.name} Instructions: {docProps.pdfData.treatmentInstruction} )} ); const PdfCreator = (props) =>{ docProps = props; return (
Document Generator: {docProps.pdfType}
{docProps.pdfType === "test" && ( )} {docProps.pdfType === "patientReferral" && ( )} {docProps.pdfType === "operationReminder" && ( )} {docProps.pdfType === "miscNote" && ( )} {docProps.pdfType === "sickNote" && ( )} {docProps.pdfType === "diagTest" && ( )} {docProps.pdfType === "insuranceNote" && ( )} {docProps.pdfType === "prescription" && ( )} {docProps.pdfType === "procedureConsent" && ( )} {docProps.pdfType === "fitToFlyAuthorization" && ( )} {docProps.pdfType === "treatmentInstruction" && ( )}
) } export default PdfCreator;
